changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_guild_applicant') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_guild_applicant GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.add_guild_applicant @character_id dbo.id_t, @guild_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
INSERT INTO dbo.Guild_Applicants(character_id, guild_id) VALUES (@character_id, @guild_id)
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_guild_applicant') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_guild_applicant GO
